articles.title: Airbus to build ESA space science satellite - SpaceNews
articles.description: ESA has awarded Airbus Defence and Space a contract to build a spacecraft that will provide a unique view of the sun.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON The European Space Agency has awarded Airbus Defence and Space a contract to build a spacecraft that will provide a unique view of the sun.
